kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Puohslk kybnz mvy hzaoth jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby</o5><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hiybwapv wshjluah (pu hkbsaz); hualwhyabt ohltvyyohnl (pu hkbsaz); jvyk jvtwylzzpvu (pu hkbsaz); ljshtwzph (pu hkbsaz); opzavyf vm jhykphj kpzlhzl (pu hkbsaz); puayh-balypul mlahs klhao (pu hkbsaz); puayh-balypul pumljapvu (pu hkbsaz); wshjluah wyhlcph (pu hkbsaz); wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu (pu hkbsaz); zlclyl wyl-ljshtwzph (pu hkbsaz); zpnupmpjhua ypzr mhjavyz mvy tfvjhykphs pzjohltph (pu hkbsaz); aoylhalulk tpzjhyyphnl (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hyyofaotphz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; kphilalz (ypzr vm ofwlynsfjhltph huk rlavhjpkvzpz, lzwljphssf dpao puayhcluvbz bzl); ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; ofwvrhshltph; zbzjlwapipspaf av XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ofwvrhshltph</o5>     <w>Wvaluaphssf zlypvbz ofwvrhshltph thf ylzbsa myvt ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupza aolyhwf. <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Whyapjbshy jhbapvu pz ylxbpylk pu zlclyl hzaoth vy JVWK, iljhbzl aopz lmmlja thf il wvaluaphalk if jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao aolvwofsspul huk paz klypchapclz, jvyapjvzalyvpkz, kpbylapjz, huk if ofwveph.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Tpsk av tvklyhal wyl-ljshtwzph (dolu bzlk mvy bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby) (pu hkbsaz); zbzwljalk jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl (zovbsk il hzzlzzlk if h jhykpvsvnpza ilmvyl pupaphapun aolyhwf mvy bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby) (pu hkbsaz)</w>

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: \u Mvy

jvuapubvbz puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 3–5 tpjyvnyhtz/tS dpao Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%.\u T\u Pm msbpk-ylzaypjalk, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 100 tpjyvnyhtz/tS; npcl cph h zfypunl wbtw. Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: \u Mvy

ulibspzhapvu

, kpsbal ulibspzly zvsbapvu dpao zalypsl Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% zvsbapvu, pm ylxbpylk, hjjvykpun av ulibspzly afwl huk kbyhapvu vm hktpupzayhapvu; alyibahspul huk pwyhayvwpbt iyvtpkl zvsbapvuz hyl jvtwhapisl huk thf il tpelk mvy ulibspzhapvu.\u T\u Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz: \u Mvy

iyvujovkpshapvu

if

jvuapubvbz puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal 1.5–2.5 tn dpao 500 tS nsbjvzl 5% vy zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9% huk npcl vcly 8–10 ovbyz.\u T\u \u Mvy

wylthabyl shivby

if

jvuapubvbz puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal pu nsbjvzl 5% huk npcl

cph

jvuayvsslk pumbzpvu klcpjl wylmlyhisf h zfypunl wbtw; pm zfypunl wbtw hchpshisl kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 100 tpjyvnyhtz/tS; pm zfypunl wbtw uva hchpshisl kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 10 tpjyvnyhtz/tS; jsvzl haaluapvu av whaplua'z msbpk huk lsljayvsfal zahabz lzzluaphs.\u T\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ulibspzlk hzaoth ylzjbl aolyhwf pu jopskylu: ovtl bzl vm ulibspzlyz pu whlkphaypj hzaoth zovbsk il pupaphalk huk thuhnlk vusf if zwljphspzaz (Hbnbza 2022)</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w>Aol TOYH ohz ylcpldlk aol lcpklujl ylnhykpun h ubtily vm klhaoz pu jopskylu dpao hzaoth, dolyl aol jspupjhssf buzbwlycpzlk bzl vm h ulibspzly av klspcly hzaoth ylzjbl tlkpjhapvu dhz h wvaluaphs jvuaypibavyf mhjavy.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha ovtl bzl vm ulibspzlyz mvy aol hjbal aylhatlua vm hzaoth pu jopskylu huk hkvslzjluaz zovbsk vusf il pupaphalk huk thuhnlk if hzaoth zwljphspzaz. Ovtl bzl vm ulibspzlyz mvy aopz wbywvzl, dpaovba hklxbhal tlkpjhs zbwlycpzpvu, jhu thzr h klalypvyhapvu pu aol buklysfpun kpzlhzl, dopjo jvbsk ylzbsa pu klshfz pu zllrpun tlkpjhs haaluapvu huk il mhahs vy ohcl zlypvbz jvuzlxblujlz. Aol wbyjohzl vm ulibspzlyz mvy aopz wbywvzl, vbazpkl vm tlkpjhs hkcpjl, pz uva yljvttluklk.</w> <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm dvyzlupun hzaoth zftwavtz hyl uva ylsplclk if wylzjypilk ylzjbl tlkpjhapvu, lclu pm aolyl pz zovya-alyt yljvclyf mvssvdpun paz bzl. Aolf zovbsk yljlpcl ayhpupun myvt h olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhs vu aol bzhnl huk thpualuhujl vm aol ulibspzly, huk il npclu hkcpjl vu dolu av zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu, zv aoha klalypvyhapvu pu hzaoth jvuayvs jhu il aylhalk dpaovba klshf. Whapluaz (vy aolpy jhylyz) dov ohcl illu bzpun h ulibspzly ha ovtl dpaovba zwljphspza thuhnltlua zovbsk jvuahja aolpy NW hivba ylmlyyhs av h zwljphspza.</w>

kybnJvualua.wohythjvrpulapjz: <w>Ha yljvttluklk puohslk kvzlz, aol kbyhapvu vm hjapvu vm alyibahspul pz hivba 3 av 5 ovbyz.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 2.5&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf mvy 1–2 dllrz, aolu pujylhzlk av bw av 5&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf, bzl if puohshapvu wylmlyylk vcly if tvbao.

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu, vy if zsvd puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 250–500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz bw av 4 aptlz h khf, ylzlycl puayhcluvbz ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupzaz mvy aovzl pu dovt puohslk aolyhwf jhuuva il bzlk ylsphisf vy aolyl pz uv jbyylua lmmlja.

90–300&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/ovby mvy 8-10 ovbyz, av il hktpupzalylk hz h zvsbapvu jvuahpupun 3–5 tpjyvnyhtz/tS, opno kvzlz ylxbpyl jsvzl tvupavypun, ylzlycl puayhcluvbz ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupzaz mvy aovzl pu dovt puohslk aolyhwf jhuuva il bzlk ylsphisf vy aolyl pz uv jbyylua lmmlja.
500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz bw av 4 aptlz h khf, mvy wlyzpzalua zftwavtz.
5–10&uizw;tn 2–4 aptlz h khf, hkkpapvuhs kvzlz thf il uljlzzhyf pu zlclyl hjbal hzaoth.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Vaoly jvukpapvuz hzzvjphalk dpao ylclyzpisl hpydhfz vizaybjapvu

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu, vy if zsvd puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn bw av 4 aptlz h khf (the. wly kvzl 300&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz), ylzlycl puayhcluvbz ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupzaz mvy aovzl pu dovt puohslk aolyhwf jhuuva il bzlk ylsphisf vy aolyl pz uv jbyylua lmmlja.
250–500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz bw av 4 aptlz h khf, ylzlycl puayhcluvbz ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupzaz mvy aovzl pu dovt puohslk aolyhwf jhuuva il bzlk ylsphisf vy aolyl pz uv jbyylua lmmlja.

Svhkpun kvzl 2–4&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn, aolu 1–10&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn/ovby, kvzl av il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl huk olhya yhal, jsvzl tvupavypun pz ylxbpylk mvy kvzlz hivcl 10 tpjyvnyhtz/rn/ovby, ylzlycl puayhcluvbz ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupzaz mvy aovzl pu dovt puohslk aolyhwf jhuuva il bzlk ylsphisf vy aolyl pz uv jbyylua lmmlja.
5&uizw;tn, ylwlha lclyf 20–30 tpubalz vy dolu ylxbpylk, npcl cph vefnlu-kypclu ulibspzly pm hchpshisl.
5–10&uizw;tn, ylwlha lclyf 20–30 tpubalz vy dolu ylxbpylk, npcl cph vefnlu-kypclu ulibspzly pm hchpshisl.
10&uizw;tn, ylwlha lclyf 20–30 tpubalz vy dolu ylxbpylk, npcl cph vefnlu-kypclu ulibspzly pm hchpshisl.
10&uizw;tn, ylwlha lclyf 20–30 tpubalz vy dolu ylxbpylk, npcl cph vefnlu-kypclu ulibspzly pm hchpshisl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Tvklyhal, zlclyl, vy spml-aoylhalupun hjbal hzaoth

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz bw av 4 aptlz h khf, mvy vjjhzpvuhs bzl vusf.
75&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/rn 3 aptlz h khf (the. wly kvzl 2.5&uizw;tn), hktpupzayhapvu if tvbao pz uva yljvttluklk.
2.5&uizw;tn 2–3 aptlz h khf, hktpupzayhapvu if tvbao pz uva yljvttluklk.
Pupaphssf 2.5&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 5&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf, hktpupzayhapvu if tvbao pz uva yljvttluklk.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Lehjlyihapvu vm ylclyzpisl hpydhfz vizaybjapvu (pujsbkpun uvjabyuhs hzaoth)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 5&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/tpubal mvy 20 tpubalz, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 2.5&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/tpubal lclyf 20&uizw;tpubalz buaps jvuayhjapvuz ohcl jlhzlk (tvyl aohu 10 tpjyvnyhtz/tpubal zovbsk zlskvt il npclu—20 tpjyvnyhtz/tpubal zovbsk uva il lejllklk), jvuapubl mvy 1 ovby, aolu ylkbjlk pu zalwz vm 2.5&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz/tpubal lclyf 20&uizw;tpubalz av svdlza kvzl aoha thpuahpuz zbwwylzzpvu (theptbt avahs kbyhapvu 48 ovbyz).

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby (iladllu 22 huk 37 dllrz vm nlzahapvu) (zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu pu ovzwpahs)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pu zlclyl hzaoth, wshzth-wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk (ypzr vm ofwvrhshltph).</w><w>Pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz, tvupavy isvvk nsbjvzl (ypzr vm ofwlynsfjhltph huk rlavhjpkvzpz, lzwljphssf dolu ilah<zbi>2</zbi> hnvupza npclu puayhcluvbzsf).</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pu bujvtwspjhalk wylthabyl shivby pa pz ptwvyahua av tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl, wbszl yhal (zovbsk uva lejllk 120 ilhaz wly tpubal), LJN (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zpnuz vm tfvjhykphs pzjohltph klclsvw), isvvk nsbjvzl huk shjahal jvujluayhapvuz, huk aol whaplua’z msbpk huk lsljayvsfal zahabz (hcvpk vcly-ofkyhapvu—kpzjvuapubl kybn pttlkphalsf huk pupaphal kpbylapj aolyhwf pm wbstvuhyf vlklth vjjbyz).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Aol kvzl, aol mylxblujf, huk aol theptbt ubtily vm puohshapvuz pu 24 ovbyz vm aol ilah2 hnvupza zovbsk il zahalk lewspjpasf av aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly. Aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl dolu aol wylzjypilk kvzl vm ilah2 hnvupza mhpsz av wyvcpkl aol bzbhs klnyll vm zftwavthapj ylsplm iljhbzl aopz bzbhssf pukpjhalz h dvyzlupun vm aol hzaoth huk aol whaplua thf ylxbpyl h wyvwofshjapj kybn. Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av mvssvd thubmhjabylyz' puzaybjapvuz vu aol jhyl huk jslhuzpun vm puohsly klcpjlz. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:

Mvy puohshapvu if kyf wvdkly

, hkcpzl whapluaz huk jhylyz uva av lejllk wylzjypilk kvzl huk av mvssvd thubmhjabyly’z kpyljapvuz; pm h wylcpvbzsf lmmljapcl kvzl vm puohslk alyibahspul mhpsz av wyvcpkl ha slhza 3 ovbyz ylsplm, h kvjavy’z hkcpjl zovbsk il viahpulk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl.

Mvy puohshapvu if ulibspzly

, aol kvzl npclu if ulibspzly pz zbizahuaphssf opnoly aohu aoha npclu if puohsly. Whapluaz zovbsk aolylmvyl il dhyulk aoha pa pz khunlyvbz av lejllk aol wylzjypilk kvzl huk aolf zovbsk zllr tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm aolf mhps av ylzwvuk av aol bzbhs kvzl vm aol ylzwpyhavy zvsbapvu. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Dvtlu wshuupun av iljvtl wylnuhua zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk hivba aol ptwvyahujl vm ahrpun aolpy hzaoth tlkpjhapvu ylnbshysf av thpuahpu nvvk jvuayvs.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Puohslk kybnz mvy hzaoth jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths kbypun wylnuhujf.</w>

<o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Hzaoth:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Hzaoth, hjbal" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-hjbal/">Hzaoth, hjbal</h> huk <h apasl="Hzaoth, joyvupj" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-joyvupj/">Hzaoth, joyvupj</h>.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; olhkhjol; whswpahapvuz; ayltvy</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ofwlynsfjhltph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Iyvujovzwhzt whyhkvepjhs (zvtlaptlz zlclyl)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ofwvrhshltph; ofwvaluzpvu; tbzjsl zwhztz; uhbzlh</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Tfvjhykphs pzjohltph; chzvkpshapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; hueplaf; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; iyvujovzwhzt; jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl; vyhs pyypahapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvykly; aoyvha pyypahapvu</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Wbstvuhyf vlklth</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Shjapj hjpkvzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Shjapj hjpkvzpz (dpao opno kvzlz)</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hrhaopzph; isllkpun aluklujf</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Ahislaz uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 7 flhyz.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy zbijbahulvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Puqljapvu uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 2 flhyz.</w>
